scripts.init-tools: npm i -g @antora/cli @antora/site-generator-default cross-env && npm run first-deploy
scripts.first-deploy: npm i && npm run add-lunr && npm run init-gitignore
scripts.init-gitignore: touch .gitignore && echo node_modules >> .gitignore && echo package-lock.json >> .gitignore && echo public >> .gitignore
scripts.clean: rm -rf supplemental_ui && rm -rf public && rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json
scripts.build: cross-env DOCSEARCH_ENABLED=true DOCSEARCH_ENGINE=lunr DOCSEARCH_INDEX_VERSION=latest antora --generator antora-site-generator-lunr antora-playbook.yml --fetch
